Reviews.Title: Samsung Ace
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine so far.It is my first smart phone and I had to download the user manual from the internet. I am learning new things about it everyday. The only improvement I see it needs is the Manual to come with the phone.

Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung S5830L Galaxy Ace
Reviews.Author: Kim J
Reviews.Content: I received my Samsung S5830L Galaxy Ace as expected, I was pleased to see that it arrived on time as it was ordered during the Christmas rush period.  So far I am happy with my purchase.  I still have a lot to learn as I have not spent a lot a time as yet learning the features of my phone.

Reviews.Title: Chic and good quality product
Reviews.Author: wild housewife
Reviews.Content: I love it, I love it, I love it. Very comfortable to hold, chic, slim, nice looking and good quality product. This model works in USA and should work in Europe as well (didn't try yet)!Thanks, Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Miguel Falsone
Reviews.Content: The cellphone was fine, new and perfect status. Just i didn't know it was so slowly, i can't install applications 'cause it's just too slow,.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Adrian Zambrano
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this smartphone to everyone, because it is light-weight, multifunctional (GPS, Wifi, Internet, many applications allowed) and one of the most important things is its quad-core feature that allows you to adapt it to different telecom bandwith range for international users.

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: JUAN CARLOS VILLARROEL
Reviews.Content: excelente, me ha sido útil y era lo que yo esperaba. lo recomiendo. Ha funcionado muy bien, incluso muy rápido el internet

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone is compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100 - HSDPA 850/1900 MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities.
Android OS, v2.2 (Froyo); 5 MP Camera with autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging and video recording; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot; GPS Navigator with A-GPS support; Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP and microSD, up to 32GB.
TFT capacitive touchscreen; DNSe sound enhancement; Stereo FM radio with RDS; Google Search, Talk, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Calendar; Document and image editor; Media player; Swype text input method and Gorilla Glass display.
Talk time up to 11 hrs - Standby up to 640 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S5830L Galaxy Ace Unlocked Quad-Band 3G GSM Phone with 5MP Camera, 3.5 Inch Touchscreen, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi (Onyx Black)
